name: Workexcuses
0:
”Alexa, open work excuses”
”Alexa, launch work excuses”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: work excuses
des:
Never be without a snappy excuse for missing work. With this skill you can feel confident you'll be covered with a range of funny, outrageous - and unbelievable - excuses :)

Here's a couple of samples. You're welcome.

"My brain went to sleep and I couldn't wake it up" 
"I got abducted by aliens last night and this morning i'm feeling a bit spaced out" 
"I believe in cosmic ordering, and the universe told me to take the day off"

and tons more...
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
